widgetSection.title: What Our Widget Can Do
description: Our widget delivers an engaging and realistic experience of your property.
It helps your clients make informed decisions. We offer easy-to-use solutions that integrate seamlessly into your business.
featuresDescription: Buyers can view a complete digital replica of the property, even if it's under construction or located abroad.
The widget allows users to explore floor plans and interior designs, helping them envision their future home more clearly.
Users can freely move between rooms, making it easier to explore and compare layouts.
The 3D widget displays exact layouts, including room sizes, window and door placements, and available views.
Interacting with real estate becomes as engaging as a video game. As a result, users stay longer and are more likely to return.
The widget works on desktop, mobile, tablets, and even VR headsets in your office to provide an immersive presentation.
